mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST (POST_SEQ, title, contents, REVIEW_PUB_YN, USR_EMAIL, TRV_SEQ) values ( #{postSeq}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{reviewPubYn}, #{usrEmail}, #{trvSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT POST_SEQ as postSeq, TITLE as title, CONTENTS as contents, REVIEW_PUB_YN as reviewPubYn, USR_EMAIL as usrEmail, TRV_SEQ as trvSeq FROM POST WHERE POST_SEQ = #{postSeq }
